title: Roger Salus: A Perspective On Contemporary Economics
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Roger Salus writes what I think is some of the most clear, creative and original economic analyses on Seeking Alpha. In this brief interview, Salus helps us understand what contributes to making a country more prosperous. He also elaborates on his “two-economy world” thesis – the notion that the world’s most developed economies have become increasingly stratified between those for whom the traditional economy is working and those for whom it is not. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Roger Salus writes what I think is some of the most clear, creative and original economic analyses on Seeking Alpha. In this brief interview, Salus helps us understand what contributes to making a country more prosperous. He also elaborates on his “two-economy world” thesis – the notion that the world’s most developed economies have become increasingly stratified between those for whom the traditional economy is working and those for whom it is not.
